overview.title: Development Overview
overview.description: URC and SUTU represents a complete digital transformation of educational processes through mobile technology. I architected and developed a comprehensive React Native solution handling complex academic workflows, multi-role user management, and extensive document processing.
overview.institutions: South Ural Technological University & Ural Regional College

challenge.title: Technical Challenges
challenge.description: Educational institutions require complex mobile solutions handling vast amounts of academic data, multiple user roles, document management, and real-time synchronization while maintaining security and performance.

problems.title: Multi-Role Architecture
problems.description: Complex permission system for students, faculty, and administrators

problems.title: Large Data Volumes
problems.description: Handling extensive academic records, documents, and multimedia content

problems.title: Offline Requirements
problems.description: Critical academic information must be accessible without internet connection

problems.title: Document Processing
problems.description: Complex document workflows including uploads, reviews, and version control

solution.title: Technical Solution
solution.description: I developed a sophisticated React Native application with advanced state management, offline-first architecture, and role-based access control to handle complex educational workflows and data management.

features.title: Dual-Role Architecture
features.description: Engineered flexible user interface that dynamically adapts based on user role (student vs faculty) with appropriate feature access.
details: Dynamic UI rendering based on permissions

features.title: Academic Data Management
features.description: Comprehensive system for managing grades, schedules, academic plans, and student records with real-time updates.

features.title: Document Workflow System
features.description: Advanced document management supporting coursework uploads, peer reviews, portfolio creation, and version control.

features.title: Offline-First Architecture
features.description: Robust offline capabilities ensuring critical academic information remains accessible without internet connectivity.
